text:
Nearst | https://near.st | London, UK | ONSITE | NodeJS, AWS

NearSt is hiring a lead developer, who will be working on making the world's local inventory searchable. You'll be leading a team.

Learn more here: https://medium.com/@tschoffelen/do-you-want-to-join-the-figh...

It it sounds like something you're interested in, my co-founder Nick would love to have a chat with you: nick [at] nearst.co.
